author: Reuters Editorial
title: Esrey Announces Resignation Of President And CEO And Filing Of First Quarter Results
text:
March 1 (Reuters) - Esrey Resources Ltd:
* ESREY ANNOUNCES RESIGNATION OF PRESIDENT AND CEO AND FILING OF FIRST QUARTER RESULTS
* ‍KIRK ADAMS HAS RESIGNED FROM POSITION OF PRESIDENT AND CHIEF EXECUTIVE OFFICER​
* ‍BOARD HAS APPOINTED DAVID COHEN, CURRENTLY CHAIRMAN AND DIRECTOR, AS INTERIM PRESIDENT AND CEO OF COMPANY EFFECTIVE IMMEDIATELY​ Source text for Eikon: (Reuters.Brief@thomsonreuters.com)
